channel.title: PI character-rights after visiting the bankchanges
channel.description:
im trying to make it so chaotic longsword is admin only weapon
ive made it so when trying to equip the item it says mod only items etc
but after visiting the bank on my admin account my character rights changes from 3 to 1
so i can not equip the item again
is this a easy fix something i missed

item.title: PI character-rights after visiting the bankchanges
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“forsh, post:5, topic:404293”]i checked that and can not see anyhting that shouldnt be there

ill carry on looking for things

thanks all[/quote]
Look in ActionHandler for the bank ID, and see if it say’s something like this,

case BANK_ID:
if(c.playerRights == 3) 
{
c.playerRights == 1;
c.getPA().openUpBank();
}
break;

Read full topic
item.source: PI character-rights after visiting the bankchanges
